June 16, 1888 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Prizes: £21 and trombone, 2nd £16, 3rd £10, 4th £4. 5 bands competed
Jan. 1, 2012, 12:04 p.m. May 16, 2019, 2:04 p.m.
1 Leeds Forge Edwin Swift L'Etoile du Nord [arr. Godfrey]
2 Black Dyke Band Alexander Owen Faust - selection (Berlioz, unknown arranger)
3 Wyke Old George F. Birkinshaw Beethoven's Works [arr. Swift]
4 Wyke Edwin Swift Beethoven's Works [arr. Swift]
Unknown Result Todmorden Old Band Unknown Beethoven's Works [arr. Swift]
